channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Bluefield 2 DPU BMC, BlueField 3 DPU BMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Bluefield 2 DPU BMC, BlueField 3 DPU BMC

item.title: CVE-2023-31037|2024-08-02T14:45:25.681Z -- nvidia -- bluefield%202%20dpu%20bmc%2C%20bluefield%203%20dpu%20bmc
item.description: NVIDIA Bluefield 2 and Bluefield 3 DPU BMC contains a vulnerability in ipmitool, where a root user may cause code injection by a network call. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to code execution on the OS.
